about_the_game: This is a 3 Car Demo of Lock N Drop Bracket Racing. Mostly to make sure your hardware can run the game smoothly before you purchase.
detailed_description: This is a 3 Car Demo of Lock N Drop Bracket Racing. Mostly to make sure your hardware can run the game smoothly before you purchase.
name: Lock n Drop Bracket Racing Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-12700H, 2300 Mhz, 14 Core(s), 20 Logical Processor(s)
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Laptop GPU
